skills.description: Detects, installs, and configures mcp-cli binary and its config directory

skills.name: create-pattern
skills.description: Creates or enhances pattern files with proper depth and structure for skills or as standalone reference content

commands.description: Guided entry point for building agents or skills. Routes to the right skill pipeline and threads project context through the workflow.

commands.name: how-it-works
commands.description: Display a visual guide explaining how the factory works, what components exist, and how to get started.
